about_the_game:
Look At Me is a first-person horror co-op game for up to 4 players, where the goal is to escape a haunted house by solving mysteries and avoiding the ghost of a girl who died in the house a long time ago.

Game Features:

  • Co-op mode for up to 4 players
  • First-person perspective with keyboard and mouse, or controller controls
  • A dark, intense atmosphere
  • A ghost with unique, terrifying mechanics
  • Mental health system
  • Jumpscares and other frightening surprises

Feel the Dark Atmosphere


The game’s atmosphere is overwhelmingly intense, immersing players in the heart of horror. Haunted rooms, flickering lights, and whispering voices in the darkness create a sense of unease, making every step a challenge. Throughout, you’ll feel the sensation of being watched. The game envelops you in its ambiance, testing your tolerance for fear.

Danger Around Every Corner


Safety in this game is an illusion—danger lurks behind every corner. Every sound, creak, rustle, or unexpected noise could signal an approaching threat. Seemingly empty rooms may hide unseen dangers, and the ghost girl appears when you least expect it. To survive, you’ll need to stay alert, ready for surprises, and make split-second decisions. Fear will be your constant companion in this game.

Solve Puzzles


The path to freedom is not simple—escaping the haunted house requires you to tackle a series of intricate puzzles and uncover deeply buried secrets. Solving these challenges demands logical thinking and connecting clues you find along the way. The puzzles are rooted in the game world, often linked to the house’s past and its tragic events, adding depth to the story. As you solve them, you’ll learn more about the mysterious history of the place, but each step also brings you closer to the ultimate truth—and to the danger that comes with it.
